# éƒ¨ç½²

# åˆ›å»ºService

ä»¥NodePortç±»å‹ä¸ºä¾‹ï¼Œç«¯å£é…ç½®è¯·ä»¥åº”ç”¨çš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸ºæ ‡å‡†ã€‚

    app: apinto-gateway  #ç»‘å®šæ ‡ç­¾ä¸ºapp: apinto-gatewayçš„POD

# éƒ¨ç½²POD(ä¸æŒ‚è½½ç›®å½•)

ä¸æŒ‚è½½å®¹å™¨ç›®å½•å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨deploymentè¿›è¡Œéƒ¨ç½²ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨replicasæŒ‡å®šå‰¯æœ¬æ•°é‡ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºè¯¥deploymentä¹‹åæ‰€æœ‰PODä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åŠ å…¥é›†ç¾¤ã€‚

  replicas: 3
  selector:  
    matchLabels:
      app: apinto-gateway #PODæ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œç”¨äºä¸Serviceç»‘å®šã€‚
  # å®šä¹‰ Pod ç›¸å…³æ•°æ®

      # å®šä¹‰å®¹å™¨
      containers:
      - name: apinto-gateway # å®¹å™¨åå­—
        image: eolinker/apinto-gateway:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart: #å®¹å™¨è¿è¡ŒåŠ å…¥é›†ç¾¤è„šæœ¬
            exec:
              command: ["/bin/bash", "-c", "nohup bash /apinto/join.sh >nohup.out 2>&1 &"]

# éƒ¨ç½²POD(æŒ‚è½½ç›®å½•)

æ³¨æ„ï¼šå½“è¦æŒ‚è½½å­˜æ”¾æ—¥å¿—å’Œæ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶çš„/var/lib/apintoç›®å½•æ—¶ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªPVCåªèƒ½è¢«ä¸€ä¸ªPODä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

# Localå·æœ¬åœ°æŒ‚è½½

ä½¿ç”¨Localå·éœ€è¦åˆ›å»ºSC,PVä»¥åŠPVCã€‚å»ºè®®PVé…ç½®nodeAffinityï¼Œä½¿æŒ‚è½½ç›®å½•åˆ†é…åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰workerèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

# åˆ›å»ºStorageClass å­˜å‚¨ç±»

# åˆ›å»ºPersistentVolume

# åˆ›å»ºPOD

ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸ºå¤šä¸ªPODé›†ç¾¤éƒ¨ç½²çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œå•ä¸ªPODéƒ¨ç½²åˆ é™¤lifecycleä»¥åŠenvå³å¯ã€‚

apiVersion: v1

  labels: 
    app: apinto-gateway #æ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œç”¨äºç»‘å®šService

    volumes:
    - name: pv-local
      persistentVolumeClaim:
        claimName: pvc-local-node1 #ä½¿ç”¨çš„pvc
    containers:
    - name: apinto-gateway 
      image: eolinker/apinto-gateway:latest 
      imagePullPolicy: Always 
      lifecycle:
        postStart: #å®¹å™¨è¿è¡Œå‰å¯åŠ¨åŠ å…¥é›†ç¾¤è„šæœ¬

            command: ["/bin/bash","-c","bash /apinto/leave.sh"]

        name: pv-local
      env:
      - name: POD_IP #å°†pod_idåŠ å…¥ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
        valueFrom:
          fieldRef:
            fieldPath: status.podIP
      - name: SVC_NAME  #å°†apintoæœåŠ¡ååŠ å…¥ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
        value: "apinto-gateway-svc"
      - name: SVC_NAMESPACE #æŒ‡å®šapintoæœåŠ¡æ‰€åœ¨å‘½åç©ºé—´
        value: "default"

        value: "9400"
      - name: SVC_TOKEN  #å°†masterèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„TOKENåŠ å…¥ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
        value: "${TOKEN}"

        value: "default"
      - name: APINTO_ADMIN_PORT
        value: "9400"
      - name: SVC_TOKEN  #å°†masterèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„TOKENåŠ å…¥ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
        value: "${TOKEN}"

# åŠ¨æ€NFSå·ï¼ˆæ¨èï¼‰

æˆ‘ä»¬æ¨èä½¿ç”¨åŠ¨æ€NFSå·è¿›è¡Œè¿œç¨‹ç›®å½•æŒ‚è½½ï¼Œç†ç”±å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

  • å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡åˆ›å»ºPVCåŠ¨æ€åœ°åˆ›å»ºå¯¹åº”PVï¼Œæ— éœ€æ‰‹åŠ¨åˆ›å»ºPVã€‚
  • æ¯åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªPVCï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šåœ¨NFSæœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸Šçš„å…±äº«ç›®å½•åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªä»¥ ${namespace}-${pvcName}-${pvName}çš„å‘½åæ ¼å¼çš„ç›®å½•ï¼Œæ— éœ€æ‰‹åŠ¨åœ¨NFSæœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸Šåˆ›å»ºå¤šä¸ªç›®å½•ã€‚å¹¶ä¸”å›æ”¶æ—¶ä¼šé‡å‘½åä¸ºarchieved-${namespace}-${pvcName}-${pvName} çš„å‘½åæ ¼å¼çš„ç›®å½•ã€‚

å¤‡æ³¨ï¼šNFS Serverè¦èƒ½ä¸k8sé›†ç¾¤å†…ä½¿ç”¨nfså·çš„workerèŠ‚ç‚¹è¿é€šã€‚

# åˆ›å»ºnfs-client-provisioner POD
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-client-provisioner
spec:
  replicas: 1
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-client-provisioner
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-client-provisioner
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      containers:
        - name: nfs-client-provisioner
          image: quay.io/external_storage/nfs-client-provisioner:latest
          volumeMounts:
            - name: nfs-client-root
              mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          env:
            - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
              value: apinto/nfs-client-provisioner  #PROVISIONER_NAMEéœ€è¦ä¸ä¸‹é¢StorageClassçš„provisionerä¿æŒä¸€è‡´
            - name: NFS_SERVER
              value: ${NFS_SERVER}   #NFS_SERVERçš„å€¼éœ€è¦ä¸ä¸‹é¢çš„NFS_SERVERä¿æŒä¸€è‡´
            - name: NFS_PATH
              value: /nfs/data/apinto   #NFS_PATHçš„å€¼éœ€è¦ä¸å¦é—¨çš„pathå€¼ä¿æŒä¸€è‡´
      volumes:
        - name: nfs-client-root
          nfs:
            server: ${NFS_SERVER} #NFSæœåŠ¡å™¨IP
            path: /nfs/data/apinto    #NFS å…±äº«ç›®å½•

# åˆ›å»ºStorageClass
apiVersion: storage.k8s.io/v1
kind: StorageClass
metadata:
  name: managed-nfs-storage
provisioner: apinto/nfs-client-provisioner # or choose another name, must match deployment's env PROVISIONER_NAME'
reclaimPolicy: Delete  #å›æ”¶ç­–ç•¥
parameters:
  archiveOnDelete: "true" #å›æ”¶æ—¶æ˜¯å¦å°†è¦åˆ é™¤çš„ç›®å½•é‡å‘½åä¿å­˜

# æˆæƒprovisioner

è‹¥é›†ç¾¤å¯ç”¨äº†RBACï¼Œéœ€è¦é…ç½®æˆæƒã€‚

kind: ServiceAccount
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: nfs-client-provisioner
---
kind: ClusterRole
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
metadata:
  name: nfs-client-provisioner-runner
rules:
  - apiGroups: [""]
    resources: ["persistentvolumes"]
    verbs: ["get", "list", "watch", "create", "delete"]
  - apiGroups: [""]
    resources: ["persistentvolumeclaims"]
    verbs: ["get", "list", "watch", "update"]
  - apiGroups: ["storage.k8s.io"]
    resources: ["storageclasses"]
    verbs: ["get", "list", "watch"]
  - apiGroups: [""]
    resources: ["events"]
    verbs: ["create", "update", "patch"]
---
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
metadata:
  name: run-nfs-client-provisioner
subjects:
  - kind: ServiceAccount
    name: nfs-client-provisioner
    namespace: default
roleRef:
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: nfs-client-provisioner-runner
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
---
kind: Role
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
metadata:
  name: leader-locking-nfs-client-provisioner
rules:
  - apiGroups: [""]
    resources: ["endpoints"]
    verbs: ["get", "list", "watch", "create", "update", "patch"]
---
kind: RoleBinding
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
metadata:
  name: leader-locking-nfs-client-provisioner
subjects:
  - kind: ServiceAccount
    name: nfs-client-provisioner
    # replace with namespace where provisioner is deployed
    namespace: default
roleRef:
  kind: Role
  name: leader-locking-nfs-client-provisioner
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io

# åˆ›å»ºPersistentVolumeClaim
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  name: nfs-dynamic-claim
  annotations:
    volume.beta.kubernetes.io/storage-class: "managed-nfs-storage"
spec:
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteMany
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 1Gi
